AssociationRules.mappers

Class AssociationMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<java.lang.Object,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.IntWritable>
      • AssociationRules.mappers.AssociationMapper

  • public class AssociationMapper
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<java.lang.Object,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.IntWritable>
    AssociationMapper is the mapper used for extraction of the association rules. The class handles the input preparation of the map reduce job by parsing the input files into key, value pairs and generating all permutations.
    Since:
    1.0

      static class  AssociationMapper.Counters
      Enumerator keeping count of the total key, value pairs that have been written to the context

    • Method Detail

      • map

        public void map(java.lang.Object key,
                org.apache.hadoop.io.Text value,
                org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
         throws java.io.IOException,
                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Parses an input value into a key, value pair and generates all permutations. The method will take the input key and split it by a tab character into a key and a value. The key is an itemset and the value the count for the itemset. The mapper will then write all permutations (sortings) of the itemset to the context.

        INPUT FORMAT

        key : lineidentifier
        value: frequent itemset and count, e.g. 1;2;3tab3

        OUTPUT FORMAT

        key : Itemset permutation, e.g. 1;2;3
        value: frequency of itemset, e.g. 5

        Overrides:
        map in class org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<java.lang.Object,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.IntWritable>
        Parameters:
        key - a input file lineidentifier
        value - the concatenated itemset-count pair
        context - the context of the map reduce job
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is called in a file system context
        java.lang.InterruptedException - executed as thread, therefore can be interrupted
